Html:
Hi mark,

I developed a app using Naudio .I use Makeupgain=5,attacktime=50,release time=50,threshold=-14,Ratio=3,treable=-5.When song goes low to high bit some shuttering are there how to solve this problem?
Have you made a compressor of some type?
Thanks mark for your valuable reply.Yes we have made compressor using sample compressor stream.cs class.
OK, that class is rather old, and I'd like to replace it at some point with something better. Possibly it is clipping going on, especially with that amount of makeup gain.
